direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve handling binary data and have similar control flows for processing attribute values.
Both methods process and manipulate the 'username' attribute, albeit in different ways (encoding vs. comparison).
The 'equals' method relies on the 'getDataLength' method to compare the lengths of the 'username' attributes.
Both methods involve setting or comparing the 'username' attribute, though one is for setting and the other for comparison.
The 'equals' method indirectly relies on the 'getUsername' method by comparing the byte arrays returned by it.
